Typealiases.html#/ROMLayoutConstraintPri.name: ROMLayoutConstraintPriority
Typealiases.html#/ROMLayoutConstraintPri.abstract: Typealias for layout constraint priority values on iOS/tvOS.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Romita27ROMLayoutCo.name: ROMLayoutConstraintPriority
Typealiases.html#/s:6Romita27ROMLayoutCo.abstract: Typealias for layout constraint priority values on macOS.

Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultNibName.name: defaultNibName
Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultNibName.abstract: Returns the default nib name for the receiver which is its class name.

Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultReuseIden.name: defaultReuseIdentifier
Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultReuseIden.abstract: Returns the default reuse identifier for the receiver which is its class name.

Extensions/UIView.html#/firstResponder.name: firstResponder
Extensions/UIView.html#/firstResponder.abstract: Returns the first responder or nil if nothing is currently first responder.

Extensions/UIView.html#/recursiveSubview.name: recursiveSubviews
Extensions/UIView.html#/recursiveSubview.abstract: Returns a list of all the receiver’s subviews, computed recursively.

Extensions/UIView.html#/viewController.name: viewController
Extensions/UIView.html#/viewController.abstract: Returns the receiver’s owning view controller or if it cannot be found.

Extensions/UIView.html#/startShakeAnimat.name: startShakeAnimation(duration:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/startShakeAnimat.abstract: Starts a shake animation that will last duration seconds.

Extensions/UIView.html#/viewOfClass(_:).name: viewOfClass(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/viewOfClass(_:).abstract: Returns the first view of class walking up the view hierarchy or nil if one cannot be found.

Extensions/UITableView.html#/registerHea.name: registerHeaderFooterViewClass(_:)
Extensions/UITableView.html#/registerHea.abstract: Registers the provided header footer view class for reuse.

Extensions/UITableView.html#/dequeueReus.name: dequeueReusableCellClass(_:for:)
Extensions/UITableView.html#/dequeueReus.abstract: Dequeues a reusable cell of the provided class.

Extensions/UITableView.html#/dequeueReus.name: dequeueReusableHeaderFooterViewClass(_:)
Extensions/UITableView.html#/dequeueReus.abstract: Dequeues a reusable header footer view of the provided class.

Extensions/UIStackView.html#/addArranged.name: addArrangedSubviews(_:)
Extensions/UIStackView.html#/addArranged.abstract: Adds the provided subviews as arranged subviews of the receiver.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/regist.name: registerSupplementaryViewClass(_:kind:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/regist.abstract: Registers the provided supplementary view class for reuse.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.name: dequeueReusableCellClass(_:for:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.abstract: Dequeues a reusable cell of the provided class.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.name: dequeueReusableSupplementaryViewClass(_:kind:for:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.abstract: Dequeues a reusable supplementary view of the provided class.

Extensions/UIApplication.html#/openSetti.name: openSettings(options:completion:)
Extensions/UIApplication.html#/openSetti.abstract: Open the application specific settings in the Settings app.

Extensions/ROMView.html#/s:So6NSViewC6Ro.name: pinToSuperviewEdges(_:safeAreaLayoutGuideEdges:edgeInsets:priority:activate:)
Extensions/ROMView.html#/s:So6NSViewC6Ro.abstract: Returns a set of layout constraints that will pin the receiver to edges and/or safeAreaLayoutGuideEdges of its superview with edgeInsets, the provided priority, and optionally activate the constraints before returning.

Extensions/ROMView.html#/s:So6NSViewC6Ro.name: setTranslatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints(_:)
Extensions/ROMView.html#/s:So6NSViewC6Ro.abstract: Sets the receiver’s translatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints property to value and returns the receiver.

Extensions/ROMColor/ColorSpace.html.name: ColorSpace
Extensions/ROMColor/ColorSpace.html.abstract: Represents a supported color space for random color generation.

Extensions/ROMColor.html#/s:So7NSColorC6.name: random(inColorSpace:alpha:)
Extensions/ROMColor.html#/s:So7NSColorC6.abstract: Returns a random color created in the provided colorSpace and alpha value.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.name: colors
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.abstract: Get/set the colors that are used by the underlying CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.name: locations
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.abstract: Get/set the locations that used as the gradient stops by the underlying CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.name: startPoint
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.abstract: Get/set the start point of the underlying CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.name: endPoint
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:6Romita12Gr.abstract: Get/set the end point of the underlying CAGradientLayer.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
